### The Origin Story

My journey into the digital realm began at a young age, where I discovered the magic of video games. This curiosity sparked a passion for technology that would shape my entire future. After completing secondary school, I knew exactly where I wanted to goâ€”Nanyang Polytechnic, where I pursued a diploma in Infocomm Technology.
